channel.title: [317]Capescape![317]
channel.description:
Hey guys! If your looking for a development team and you just can't find the right one? Then hopefully we can help! This IS Capescape!
A 317 Server created by Anthony and Myself. We're hoping that we can get as many people as we can at the moment! I will list a bit of information about the server and stuff...
We are a 317 server and I'm hoping to get our Webclient up and running. We're hoping to get LOADS of members in our website and our server and webclient! We are unfortunately not 24/7 and I'm hoping that we can purchase a package for that sooooon! If you would like to join then just visit one of these websites: * (This is the one with the most members.) * (This is our new one that we can hopefully transfer ALL our members back over to.)
I'm hoping that you guys will be interested in joining and being apart of the development team!
These are the spaces available. Hoster - Me for now unless I get someone better to do so. Tester - We need 1 or 2 of these so that we can get different timezones for those who are off when I'm on! Web Designer - The best will be the Head Web Designer HTML Coder - You will be following my instructions
And just list your best! We are not accepting applications for staff but only coding applications but if you want to become a staff member then follow all the rules and be nice and stuff like that and we'll think about it for a little while!
You will have to fill out this application format!
Name: Age: Experience(In Years.): Your top 3 best skills: How can you help us: Do you think you've got what it takes:
If your application inspires me then you'll be accepted into the crew!
Thanks and hopefully you'll be interested in join because we need as many people as we can at the moment guys!
Thanks -Nameme123 Capescape Head Owner/ Creator

item.title: [317]Capescape![317]
item.dc:creator: @OmgItsShane Shane
item.description:
@OmgItsShane wrote:

Name: Shane
Age: 21
Experience(In Years.): 2-3
Your top 3 best skills: Im Very good in Website design and good coder and a great player/staff overall :)!
How can you help us: I can help with site and code A bit and help players all i can! I can also start Advertising Servers and make the offical Trailor for your server and i can advertise server on Multiple Website including Moparscape and hell if you need a host i can host. And i will Start Donating a bit to Improve the Server once i join the Team! :)!
Do you think you’ve got what it takes: Yes, i had a server of my own once!
Email?: Shane9000100@hotmail.com

Posituation?: Website Designer or Tester!

Read full topic

item.description:

Removed website links. Advertising is not allowed, use your signature.

item.title: [317]Capescape![317]
item.dc:creator: @Nameme123 Nameme123
item.description:
@Nameme123 wrote:

Hey guys!
If your looking for a development team and you just can’t find the right one? Then hopefully we can help!
This IS Capescape!

A 317 Server created by Anthony and Myself.
We’re hoping that we can get as many people as we can at the moment!
I will list a bit of information about the server and stuff…

We are a 317 server and I’m hoping to get our Webclient up and running.
We’re hoping to get LOADS of members in our website and our server and webclient!
We are unfortunately not 24/7 and I’m hoping that we can purchase a package for that sooooon!
If you would like to join then just visit one of these websites:

  • (This is the one with the most members.)
  • (This is our new one that we can hopefully transfer ALL our members back over to.)

I’m hoping that you guys will be interested in joining and being apart of the development team!

These are the spaces available.
Hoster - Me for now unless I get someone better to do so.
Tester - We need 1 or 2 of these so that we can get different timezones for those who are off when I’m on!
Web Designer - The best will be the Head Web Designer
HTML Coder - You will be following my instructions

And just list your best!
We are not accepting applications for staff but only coding applications but if you want to become a staff member then follow all the rules and be nice and stuff like that and we’ll think about it for a little while!

You will have to fill out this application format!

Name:
Age:
Experience(In Years.):
Your top 3 best skills:
How can you help us:
Do you think you’ve got what it takes:

If your application inspires me then you’ll be accepted into the crew!

Thanks and hopefully you’ll be interested in join because we need as many people as we can at the moment guys!

Thanks
-Nameme123 Capescape Head Owner/ Creator
